title: Percentage Calculator — What is X% of Y, Percent of a Number, Increase/Decrease

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. What is X% of Y?\(\text{Result} = \dfrac{X}{100} \times Y\) 2. X is what percent of Y?\(\text{Percent} = \dfrac{X}{Y} \times 100\) 3. Percentage change\(\text{Percent change} = \dfrac{\text{New} - \text{Old}}{\text{Old}} \times 100\) 4. Add/Subtract percent\(\text{New} = \text{Original} \times (1 \pm \dfrac{p}{100})\)
